import React from "react"; import classes from './Users.module.css' let Users = (props) => { console.log(props) let header = 'Users' let but = let pages = [] for (let i = 1; i <= Math.ceil(props.pageCount / props.pageSize); i++) { pages.push(i) } if (props.users.length === 0) { header = 'Загрузка...' but = '' } return (
{header}{ props.users.map(u => (

{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status != null ? u.status : 'Here need a status'}
{"Atlantic ocean"}
{"Bikini Bottom"}
)) } {/* {but} */}
{pages.map(p => { return { props.onShowMore(p) }} className={props.currentPage === p ? classes.selectedPage : classes.page}>{p} })}
) } export default Users
